title: Stuck on Loading...
body: In the login status im stuck on the loading part whenever I try to get in. :(

replies.body: Your network might be having some difficulties getting a clear signal to our servers. It might be caused by the way your ISP is routing your connection but there's also a chance that adjusting a few settings on your pc could help out. Update some of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) using the steps in that guide and let me know if that's able to help.
